section.title: Event
section.text: This section may contain the following subsections Problems/Diagnoses This Visit, Clinical Interventions Performed This Visit and Clinical Synopsis and Diagnostic Investigations.

tr.td: Self-inflicted, deep lacerations of neck and face with a sharp object. There is a history of self-harm behaviour. The patient stated that he had had suicidal thoughts, and he said the last time was 1 year ago. Suspects that a person has a condition or disease involving their central nervous system that causes severe mental status changes. However pathology results indicate a Neisseria meningitidis infection.

act.text: Self-inflicted, deep lacerations of neck and face with a sharp object. There is a history of self-harm behaviour. The patient stated that he had had suicidal thoughts, and he said the last time was 1 year ago. Suspects that a person has a condition or disease involving their central nervous system that causes severe mental status changes. However pathology results indicate a Neisseria meningitidis infection.

section.title: Diagnostic Investigations
section.text: This section may contain the following subsections Pathology Test Result and Imaging Examination Result.

tr.td: CSF microscopy, culture and sensitivity; CSF Protein and Glucose measurements.
Polymorphonuclear cells significantly elevated, Protein significantly increased, Glucose significantly decreased, Neisseria meningitis isolated.
